8Beat

Most older rock tunes accept these. Try it with songs like "There's a Kind Of Hush".

  • 8BeatSus
  • 8Beat1
  • 8Beat1Sus
  • 8BeatPlus
  • 8BeatSusPlus
  • 8Beat1Plus
  • 8Beat1SusPlus
  • 8BeatIntro
  • 8BeatFill
  • 8BeatEnd

8Beat

Good for oldish rock stuff. (4)

Chord Honky-TonkPiano
